obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_222_0: * You told Ralsei to compliment the enemies!/
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_224_0: * You two look like a really great team! I'm proud!/
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_226_0: * (Lancer started to become a little convinced!)/%
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_230_0: * You told Ralsei to logically best Lancer and Susie./
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_232_0: * You two^1, if we don't stop fighting, then.../
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_240_0: * You told Ralsei to offer his services to the enemies!/
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_242_0: * You two^1, if we stop fighting^1, then I could^1, um.../
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_250_0: * You told Ralsei to deal the final blow of kindness!/
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_252_0: * In summary^1, I like you two^1, and.../
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_253_0: \E8* I think we should all just get along!/%
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_256_0: * You told Ralsei to compliment Lancer really fast!/
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_314_0: * (But Susie blocked the soundwaves before they reached Lancer!)/
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_316_0: * Try convincing someone that can't HEAR YOU!/%
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_351_0: * If you hit him any more^1, you might really hurt him!/
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_355_0: \E7* My insides are just..^1. a little mixed up./
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_359_0: * (Kris^1, maybe we should have taken it easier...)/%
obj_lancerboss3_slash_Step_0_gml_367_0: * I accidentally started liking the enemies...!/
